short_summary: Stage 1 - Hay Camp Culvert Replacement, Wood Buffalo National Park
description: Replace existing washed-out culvert structures on Highway 58, and Hay Camp Road KM 41  in Wood Buffalo National Park, and install new culvet. All works must conform to the Alberta road specifications.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement - [bid_number]**

**Tender Number:** 5P468-23-0086/A
**Title:** Stage 1 - Hay Camp Culvert Replacement, Wood Buffalo National Park
**Closing Date:** 2023-06-14 16:00:00

**Tender Classification:** Invitation to Qualify
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Short Description:** The Parks Canada Agency invites qualified contractors to participate in a two-stage selection process for the Hay Camp Culvert Replacement project in the Wood Buffalo National Park. The contractor will be required to remove and dispose of existing washed-out culvert structures, supply and install new culverts on Highway 58 and Hay Camp Road, and prepare the site for the new structures.

**Scope of Work:** The scope of work includes gravel haul, site preparation, removal and disposal of existing culvert structures, purchase and installation of new culverts. All required works will be performed in accordance with the Alberta Specifications for Highway Construction.

**Timeline:** The contract duration is expected to begin on July 05, 2023, and be completed by September 30, 2023.
**Contract Estimate:** The estimated value of the project is between $250,001 and $500,000, inclusive of taxes.

**Key Requirements:**

* The successful contractor must have the necessary qualifications and experience to remove and dispose of existing washed-out culvert structures
* The design and installation of the new culverts must meet Alberta Transportation Standards and Specifications
* The contractor must be able to prepare the site for the new structures and complete the work within the contract timeline

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement may be set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

**Important Notes:**

* Bids must be submitted via email or fax, as per the solicitation document
* The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes
* All enquiries regarding this tender must be submitted in writing and received no later than five business days prior to the closing date

**Contracting Authority:**

* Address: 220 - 4 Avenue SE, Suite 720, Calgary, AB T2G 4X3
* Phone: (587) 832-1894
* Email: [kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca)
* Fax: 1-855-983-1808

**Attachment:**
